decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a steady stream of powerful creatures and efficient removal spells. By utilizing cards like Winding Constrictor and Walking Ballista to boost the power of creatures like Verdurous Gearhulk and Jadelight Ranger, the deck aims to close out games quickly through aggressive plays. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Rishkar, Peema Renegade and Glint-Sleeve Siphoner help to ramp up mana production and draw cards, ensuring a consistent flow of threats and answers throughout the game.

This deck focuses on using efficient removal spells such as Fatal Push and Vraska's Contempt to control the board while deploying powerful creatures like The Scarab God and Ravenous Chupacabra to apply pressure on the opponent. Liliana, Death's Majesty provides additional value by recurring threats from the graveyard, while cards like Glint-Sleeve Siphoner help draw cards and maintain card advantage. The deck also includes counterspells like Supreme Will and disruption like Commit / Memory to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to maintain a balanced aggressive strategy with powerful threats and disruption.

The main concept of this deck is to control the board with powerful creatures like Angel of Invention and Angel of Sanctions while using cards like Champion of Wits and Strategic Planning to filter through the deck and find key pieces like God-Pharaoh's Gift. Once God-Pharaoh's Gift is on the field, the goal is to continually bring back strong creatures from the graveyard to overwhelm the opponent. Cards like Search for Azcanta and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria provide additional card advantage and control options to maintain the advantage.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through card advantage, removal, and disruption while utilizing God-Pharaoh's Gift to bring back powerful creatures from the graveyard. The deck aims to set up the graveyard with cards like Champion of Wits and Minister of Inquiries, then bring back creatures like Angel of Invention and Sunscourge Champion to overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes ways to filter through the deck and find key pieces like Refurbish and Strategic Planning. Overall, the deck focuses on resource management and graveyard recursion to outvalue the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively disrupt the opponent's strategy while maintaining a strong board presence. Utilizing powerful creatures like Glint-Sleeve Siphoner and Champion of Wits, along with removal spells like Fatal Push and Vraska's Contempt, this deck aims to control the game early on. The inclusion of Liliana, Death's Majesty and The Scarab God provides additional threats and recursion options. Overall, this deck focuses on applying pressure and disrupting the opponent's plans to secure a victory.

The deck focuses on fast, aggressive plays using creatures with +1/+1 counters and energy mechanics to quickly overwhelm opponents. By efficiently ramping up mana with Servant of the Conduit and Aether Hub, players can cast powerful threats like Bristling Hydra and Verdurous Gearhulk early on. Winding Constrictor enhances the effectiveness of these creatures, while Vraska's Contempt and Fatal Push provide removal options. Aethersphere Harvester and Skysovereign, Consul Flagship offer additional utility and evasion to close out games quickly. This deck excels at applying constant pressure and maintaining board control.

The main concept of this deck is to create a fast and aggressive strategy by utilizing cards that pump up creatures and generate extra value, such as Winding Constrictor and Jadelight Ranger. By playing efficient creatures like Glint-Sleeve Siphoner and Walking Ballista, along with removal spells like Ravenous Chupacabra, the deck can quickly overwhelm opponents and maintain card advantage. The inclusion of Aethersphere Harvester and Verdurous Gearhulk provides additional ways to push damage and close out games. The mana base is designed to support the deck's aggressive curve while providing consistent access to all colors of mana.

This deck is focused on quickly and aggressively dealing direct damage to the opponent's life total using burn spells and fast creatures. With a low mana curve and efficient creatures like Goblin Chainwhirler and Hazoret the Fervent, the goal is to apply constant pressure and close out the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Bomat Courier and Earthshaker Khenra also provide additional sources of damage and card advantage to ensure a swift victory.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly build a powerful board presence by utilizing cards that provide card advantage and mana ramp, such as Glint-Sleeve Siphoner and Llanowar Elves. This allows for strong creatures like Jadelight Ranger and Verdurous Gearhulk to dominate the battlefield. The inclusion of removal spells like Ravenous Chupacabra and Walking Ballista ensures the deck can handle opposing threats effectively. Additionally, cards like Winding Constrictor and Rishkar, Peema Renegade enhance the deck's synergy and overall power level.

The key concept of this Aggro - Rakdos Aggro deck is to have a fast-paced and aggressive playstyle, using powerful creatures like Hazoret the Fervent and Glorybringer to deal damage quickly. The deck also includes removal spells like Magma Spray and Unlicensed Disintegration to control the board and keep the pressure on the opponent. With a good mix of creatures and spells, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and finish the game before they have a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures with haste and powerful abilities to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By using cards like Bomat Courier, Goblin Chainwhirler, and Glorybringer, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently, putting pressure on the opponent from the start. Additionally, cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Hazoret the Fervent provide additional sources of damage and card advantage. The deck also includes removal spells like Abrade and Unlicensed Disintegration to deal with threats and clear the way for the aggressive creatures to continue attacking.

This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and efficient creatures, focusing on dealing damage quickly and efficiently. The key strategy revolves around utilizing powerful creatures like Goblin Chainwhirler, Hazoret the Fervent, and Rekindling Phoenix to apply pressure early on while using removal spells like Abrade and Unlicensed Disintegration to clear the way. The deck also includes cards like Bomat Courier and Chandra, Torch of Defiance to maintain card advantage and keep up the pressure. The mana base is designed to ensure consistent access to the necessary colors for impactful plays.

The main focus of this Aggro - Red Deck Wins archetype is to quickly build a board presence and deal damage to the opponent as fast as possible. Utilizing aggressive creatures such as Kari Zev, Skyship Raider and Goblin Chainwhirler, along with burn spells like Shock and Lightning Strike, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. The inclusion of cards like The Flame of Keld and Soul-Scar Mage further enhances the deck's ability to push through damage and close out the game swiftly.

The main idea for this Aggro - Red Deck Wins deck is to quickly and aggressively deal damage to the opponent using a combination of cheap burn spells like Shock and Lightning Strike, along with powerful creatures like Hazoret the Fervent and Goblin Chainwhirler. The deck aims to close out games quickly by overwhelming the opponent with fast and efficient threats, while also having access to reach with cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance. The inclusion of cards like Soul-Scar Mage and Ahn-Crop Crasher provide additional utility and flexibility in combat situations.

The main concept of this UW Control deck is to control the game through counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage. Cards like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, Settle the Wreckage, and Disallow help to control the board and opponent's actions. Search for Azcanta provides card selection and advantage, while Fumigate and Seal Away help deal with threats. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent and win through incremental advantages, outlasting the opponent until victory is achieved through Teferi's ultimate ability or overwhelming card advantage.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage provided by cards like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Search for Azcanta. It aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy by countering their spells, removing their threats, and ultimately stabilizing the board with cards like Settle the Wreckage and Fumigate. The deck aims to control the pace of the game, stall the opponent's game plan, and eventually win through incremental advantage and powerful finishers like Teferi.
